The Stour Field team were out preparing for high tides today.

Here they are closing the flood gate at Stour Sailing Club in Manningtree.

Make sure you are signed up to our FREE flood alert service: https://t.co/P6B524qsJt #Essex #Flood https://t.co/kXI7P9fEzi
